data.message:
Dear Eminem. 

 Application for grant or even loan I will pay back.

 I am Armand Amoussou now in Nigeria a nationally of Benin Republic; I humbly applying for a grant to enable me to meet an urgent Business need has a caterer.

 my business was not yet been registered; I am an experience Caterer and good chef; who is willing to have his own Restaurant; if your reputable company can grant me the fund; I will partner with the local Farmer to help them sell their farm products and employ the youth that can deliver to the Economic though your grant.

 I will be grateful if my request is consider and Favour in your company.

 Yours faithfully;

 Armand Amoussou
 Email: amoussou.armand66@yahoo.co.uk
 +2347066882059
 +2347037216278

replies.message: Go and earn the money you scrounging twat
How cheeky go and earn it shocking for you to ask him for money ,tutt,tutt,!! =-O
Isn't Your Crystal Math Money Enough?
